overall_perception_summary.headline: The Safe Powerhouse
overall_perception_summary.description: SimplyVital positions itself as the ultimate pragmatist's choice for anti-aging. By leveraging massive social proof ('1 Million+ Customers') alongside heavy clinical coding, it democratizes high-potency ingredients for the mass market. It resolves the tension between 'Retinol Power' and 'Skin Sensitivity' by aggressively foregrounding safety education and purity, becoming the 'Honda Civic' of skincare—reliable, widely adopted, and effective.

foundation.title: The Clinical Democratizer
foundation.description: The brand acts as The Healer, sourcing authority from the lab to fix aging concerns. It adopts a Democratizer mission, using '1 Million+ Customers' to frame clinical skincare as a universal right, not a luxury. Values center on Radical Transparency, balancing high potency claims ('3% Complex') with explicit safety protocols.

identity.title: The Reliable Guardian
identity.description: The personality is The Reliable Expert—distant, professional, and instructional. The archetype mix is a Guardian-Sage hybrid, prioritizing protection ('Safety Tips') and education over entertainment. Visually, it uses Pharma-Code aesthetics—sterile blues, whites, and informational grids—to signal absolute control.

communication.title: The Educational Chemist
communication.description: Messaging is pure Chemist territory, hooking users with ingredient nouns ('Collagen', 'Retinol') rather than poetic dreams. The USP is The Value Hacker, offering a 'holy trinity' of actives in a commodity format. Content Focus leans heavily into Science Education, dedicating pixels to pump mechanics and patch test protocols.

benefits.title: Corrective Safety
benefits.description: Functionally, it offers Correction, targeting the visible signs of aging with 'Power'. Emotionally, it provides Relief/Safety, mitigating the anxiety of retinol use through detailed caution. Socially, it is The Safe Choice—a purchase validated by the massive 'Majority' herd.

marker_1.reasoning: The brand derives authority from the lab ('Science-Proven Formula', 'Advanced Retinoid') rather than nature. The mission is explicitly to fix pathology and restore youth ('Anti-Aging', 'Skin Renewal', 'Treating dryness'), fitting the Clinical Correction profile perfectly.
marker_1.evidence: SCIENCE-PROVEN FORMULA... Advanced Retinoid Anti-Aging Complex 3%... Treating dryness and dullness

evaluation_check.coherence_reasoning: Slider A (Clinical) and Slider B (Fixing) both score in the low range (1-2), mapping directly to Territory 1 (The Healer).

marker_1.slider_a_label: [SLIDER] ORIGIN OF AUTHORITY (The Source of Power)

marker_2.reasoning: The scope is focused on individual skin health ('Face, Neck, Décolleté'), but the access barrier is non-existent. The '1 MILLION+ AMAZON CUSTOMERS' badge signals massive, democratic adoption. This is skincare for the many, not the few.
marker_2.evidence: 1 MILLION+ AMAZON CUSTOMERS... FOR ALL MATURE SKIN TYPES... IN YOUR 30s / 40s / 50s & BEYOND!

evaluation_check.coherence_reasoning: Slider A (Optimization) and Slider B (Democratic) create the classic 'Democratizer' profile—improving individual skin at mass scale.

marker_3.reasoning: The brand pushes high performance ('Power', '3% Complex') but balances it with data-heavy transparency rather than mystique. The explicit listing of percentages, 'Free From' icons, and detailed usage safety tips prioritizes 'Showing the Receipts' over storytelling.
marker_3.evidence: 3%... SCIENCE-PROVEN FORMULA... Lactose Free... Gluten Free... Paraben Free... PATCH TEST IS ESSENTIAL

evaluation_check.coherence_reasoning: High Performance (4) combined with High Data/Evidence (2) leads to Radical Transparency. The inclusion of specific percentage badges and safety protocols reinforces this.

marker_4.reasoning: The aesthetic is aggressively sterile—blue, white, silver, and informational grids. There is no attempt at 'lifestyle' styling beyond a generic model. Coupled with the utility signaling of the '1 Million' badge, this parks the brand firmly in the 'Pharmacy' mental slot.
marker_4.evidence: blue tones with black suggests clinical confidence... Clean white and black layout... SCIENCE-PROVEN FORMULA

evaluation_check.coherence_reasoning: Sterile Aesthetic (1-2) + Utility/Accessible Value (1-2) creates the Medical Authority territory. The absence of luxury cues confirms this.

marker_5.reasoning: The voice is not your friend; it is your instructor. It commands you ('DO NOT APPLY TO EYES', 'PATCH TEST IS ESSENTIAL') and validates itself ('Science-Proven'). Warmth is low; Authority is high.
marker_5.evidence: SAFETY TIPS... DO NOT APPLY TO EYES... USE SPF 30+... DON'T TRY TO UNSCREW THE JAR

evaluation_check.coherence_reasoning: Low Warmth (2) + High Authority (4) maps directly to The Reliable Expert. The instructional tone is decisive.

marker_6.reasoning: While the brand uses Sage-like language ('Science-Proven'), the dominant energy is The Guardian/Caregiver (Group A). It is obsessed with safety, protection, and reassurance ('Safety Tips', 'Patch Test', 'Free From'). The '1 Million Customers' adds a Ruler (Stability) dimension—dominance through numbers.
marker_6.evidence: SAFETY TIPS... PATCH TEST IS ESSENTIAL... DO NOT APPLY TO EYES... Free from Parabens and Sulfates... 1 MILLION+ AMAZON CUSTOMERS

evaluation_check.coherence_reasoning: Marker 6 uses percentage distribution, not sliders.

marker_7.reasoning: The tone is academic, dry, and warning-heavy. It uses imperative sentences ('Take the lid off', 'Collect the required amount') and technical terms ('Non-comedogenic', 'Retinoid'). Zero humor, zero slang.
marker_7.evidence: DON'T TRY TO UNSCREW THE JAR... Non-comedogenic... SCIENCE-PROVEN FORMULA

evaluation_check.coherence_reasoning: Humor (1) and Enthusiasm (2) combined with Professional Formality (3) fits the Clinical Authority rule set.

marker_8.reasoning: The visual codes are strictly medical: cyan blue, white, silver, and black. Layouts are grid-based (infographics, split panels) prioritizing control and information hierarchy over expression or mood.
marker_8.evidence: cool blues, blacks, and whites... medical imagery... step-by-step instructional panels

evaluation_check.coherence_reasoning: Slider A (Cold) + Slider B (Structured) maps perfectly to Pharma-Code (Territory 1). The 'Science-Proven' aesthetic is dominant.

marker_8.look_and_feel: Clinical, informative, and trust-focused with a utilitarian layout.
marker_8.primary_palette: Sterile white background with clinical cyan/blue accents and bold black typography.

marker_9.reasoning: The messaging leads with the noun ('Collagen, Retinol, Hyaluronic Acid') rather than the dream. The argument is rational: 'Science-Proven', '3% Complex', 'Made in USA'. It assumes the user is buying a list of chemicals.
marker_9.evidence: COLLAGEN, RETINOL & HYALURONIC ACID... Advanced Retinoid Anti-Aging Complex 3%... SCIENCE-PROVEN FORMULA

evaluation_check.coherence_reasoning: Hook (Ingredient) + Persuasion (Rational) aligns with The Chemist (Territory 1). The product title itself is just a list of ingredients.

marker_10.reasoning: There is no founder story. The protagonist is the 'Science-Proven Formula' itself. The setting is the lab (indicated by icons, molecular references, and sterile packshots). Authority is institutional.
marker_10.evidence: SCIENCE-PROVEN FORMULA... Dermatologist Tested... Molecular pattern background

evaluation_check.coherence_reasoning: Protagonist (Scientist) + Setting (Lab) maps to Territory 1. The brand story is non-existent beyond the product's formulation.

marker_11.reasoning: While it lists many 'Free-From' attributes, the core validator is the 'Science-Proven' claim and 'Dermatologist Tested' status. The '3%' badge and 'Advanced Retinoid' claim lean heavily on authority validation.

evaluation_check.coherence_reasoning: Validator (Lab/Board) dominates. While 'Free-From' lists exist (Slider B: 4), the 'Science' and 'Derm' claims (Slider A: 1-2) pull this to Territory 1 (Derm-Validation) or Territory 2 (Formula Purity). Given the 'Advanced' claim, Derm-Validation is the primary driver.

marker_11.slider_b_position_name: ▼ The Stat ('95% saw reduction in acne')

marker_12.reasoning: The USP isn't a unique molecule; it's the efficient delivery of standard 'Hero Ingredients' (Collagen, Retinol) at a democratic scale ('1 Million Customers'). It hacks the value equation by offering 'Advanced' care for the mass market.
marker_12.evidence: COLLAGEN, RETINOL & HYALURONIC ACID... 1 MILLION+ AMAZON CUSTOMERS

evaluation_check.coherence_reasoning: Ownership (Hero Ingredient) + Scope (Smart Value/Price Leader inferred from volume) maps to The Value Hacker. It sells commodity actives as a high-value package.

marker_12.slider_a_label: [SLIDER] THE OWNERSHIP CLAIM (What Makes You Unique)
marker_12.slider_b_position_name: ▼ The Smart Value (High potency for fair price)

marker_13.reasoning: The content allocates significant space to mechanics: how to use the pump, safety tips, patch testing, and ingredient lists. It is teaching the user how to use clinical skincare safely.
marker_13.evidence: HOW TO USE... PRESS SEVERAL TIMES... SAFETY TIPS FOR USING... PATCH TEST IS ESSENTIAL

evaluation_check.coherence_reasoning: Depth (Explainer) + Intent (Trust/Proof) maps to Science Education. The infographics are functional, not inspirational.

marker_14.reasoning: The function is aggressive repair. 'Anti-Aging', 'Skin Renewal', and 'Retinol' are all about correcting damage. The outcome is aesthetic: 'Refined', 'Glow', 'Look its best'.
marker_14.evidence: ANTI-AGING... SKIN RENEWAL... Helps to smooth and refine... promoting a healthy glow

evaluation_check.coherence_reasoning: Action (Repair) + Outcome (Aesthetic) maps to Correction. The focus is on reversing signs of aging.

marker_15.reasoning: Despite the 'Power' claims, the emotional anchor is safety. The prominent 'Safety Tips' graphic and 'Patch Test' warning signal that the user is anxious about retinol irritation. The brand sells the *absence* of adverse reactions.
marker_15.evidence: SAFETY TIPS... PATCH TEST IS ESSENTIAL... Discontinue use if irritation occurs

evaluation_check.coherence_reasoning: Anxiety (Reassurance) + Self-Perception (Comfort) maps to Relief/Safety. The brand proactively manages fear.

marker_16.reasoning: Buying this says 'I buy what works for a million people.' It is a tool, validated by 'Amazon Customers' and science. There is no status signal here; it is pure pragmatic logic.

evaluation_check.coherence_reasoning: Signal (Tool) + Tribal (Mass) maps to The Pragmatist. The purchase motivation is functional efficacy, not identity.

marker_16.slider_a_position_name: ▼ The Tool (I buy it only because it functions)
marker_16.slider_b_position_name: ▼ The Standard (What everyone uses; the default)

marker_17.reasoning: The massive '1 Million+ Customers' claim is the primary social lever. It invites the user to join the herd, offering safety in numbers. You aren't taking a risk; you are doing what everyone else is doing.
marker_17.evidence: 1 MILLION+ AMAZON CUSTOMERS... TRUSTED FORMULA. LOVED BY THOUSANDS

evaluation_check.coherence_reasoning: Social Vector (Assimilation) + Group Dynamic (Majority) maps to The Safe Choice. The appeal is consensus.

marker_17.slider_a_position_name: ▼ Normalization ('I want to look like everyone else')
